title: Time for a new game mode, battle royale lol
body:
Could battle royale league of legends be good? 
I’m thinking of a totally new game mode for league, and it is interesting...
It is not in first person mode.  There r items to be looted (Tri force weapons,  botrk, AOe weapon, the wands, rings) 
Players get to form squads, choices of a lot of heroes, and to fly at a location of the large map at the beginning. There r also monsters and dragons that drop from the sky (like PUBG air drops), legendary items (like Tri force, hydra, or death cap) can be found upon killing them. 
Mechanics r about the same.
There are circles as well
Last player survive wins.

replies.body: Have you played LoL lately? It already has a BR game mode: Nexus Blitz.
No I haven't played LOL for a long time. Now I see that! Good to know!
Battlerite's got a Battle Royale that might scratch any MOBA style BR itches... In retrospect BR = Battlerite, mind blown.
